data.name: Lonely Tribes
data.detailed_description:
Lonely Tribes is a puzzle game in which you beat each level by moving the characters such that they all merge together, using walls and the environment to push them together.

Later levels include special modes which allow you to completely change the method of play, such as Frenzy which moves everything 3x as far, allowing you to clip through walls, but at a cost.

There are currently 7 levels, with a level generator that can create over 4 billion different levels.
data.about_the_game:
Lonely Tribes is a puzzle game in which you beat each level by moving the characters such that they all merge together, using walls and the environment to push them together.

Later levels include special modes which allow you to completely change the method of play, such as Frenzy which moves everything 3x as far, allowing you to clip through walls, but at a cost.

There are currently 7 levels, with a level generator that can create over 4 billion different levels.
data.short_description: Merge all of the people together!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 3c-6t 2GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Plus
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 4c-8t 3GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX 580
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Any Recent Kernel
  • Processor: 2c-4t
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Plus
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: 4c-8t 3GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX 580
